SEARCH
Package gw.api.print

Class PrintAction

java.lang.Object
gw.api.print.PrintAction
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractCCPrintAction, PrintLocationAction
public abstract class PrintAction extends Object
Basis of print output functionality within the Pebbles infrastructure.

  • Constructor Details

    • PrintAction

      protected PrintAction()

    • PrintAction

      protected PrintAction(com.guidewire.pl.web.print.process.PrintProcessorFactory factory)
      This is a special variant constructor which allows specification of the print factory to be used. This is primarily for testing purposes, allowing substitution of the standard print factory with one specifically designed for test diagnostics.

  • Method Details

    • print

      protected final void print(PrintSettings settings)
      Executes the print operation. Sets up any required data before generating the PDF.
      Parameters:
      settings - print settings to apply to this print operation

    • throwPdfGenerationException

      protected void throwPdfGenerationException(IOException e)
      Throws a user-friendly exception message to indicate that the print operation has failed.
      Parameters:
      e - Internal exception that caused the failure, used to help detail what went wrong in the error message presented

    • throwCsvGenerationException

      protected void throwCsvGenerationException(IOException e)
      Throws a user-friendly exception message to indicate that the print operation has failed.
      Parameters:
      e - Internal exception that caused the failure, used to help detail what went wrong in the error message presented

    • goAndGetPrintableLocation

      protected final com.guidewire.pl.web.navigation.PrintableLocation goAndGetPrintableLocation(com.guidewire.pl.web.navigation.Destination destination)
      Return the printable location that corresponds to the given destination. This method just loads and initializes the destination's location.
      Parameters:
      destination - destination (a location) to jump to to print

    • printLocationAsPage

      protected void printLocationAsPage(com.guidewire.pl.web.print.context.PdfPrintContext context, com.guidewire.pl.web.navigation.PrintableLocation headerLocation, com.guidewire.pl.web.navigation.PrintableLocation bodyLocation) throws IOException
      Generate an XSL-FO page sequence. The page body will consist of data from bodyLocation, while the page header is taken from headerLocation. (The two locations may be the same.)
      Parameters:
      context - print context to use for printing
      headerLocation - location used to generate header for all pages printed
      bodyLocation - location used to generate the body content
      Throws:
      IOException

    • generateBody

      protected void generateBody(IPrintContext context, com.guidewire.pl.web.navigation.PrintableLocation bodyLocation) throws IOException
      Actually generates the body content of page output. Override this method to do special case body output generation.
      Parameters:
      context - print context to use for printing
      bodyLocation - location used to generate the body content
      Throws:
      IOException - if PDF generation fails

    • output

      protected final void output() throws IOException
      Manages the process of generating of body content.
      Throws:
      IOException - if PDF generation fails

    • close

      protected void close()
      Performs any final cleanup necessary. Subclasses should override this as needed, but should always call this base implementation at some point. Guaranteed to be executed whether print process succeeds or fails.

    • prePrint

      protected void prePrint()
      Performs base internal pre-print preparations.

    • postPrint

      protected void postPrint()
      Performs base internal post-print operations. Guaranteed to execute.

    • initialize

      protected abstract void initialize()
      Performs any necessary setup before generating XSL-FO code.

    • generateContent

      @InternalAPI @Deprecated public abstract void generateContent(IPrintContext context) throws IOException
      Deprecated.
      Internal method. Do not use.
      Internal method. Do not use.
      Parameters:
      context - PrintContext with the output writer defined.
      Throws:
      IOException - IOException if PDF generation fails

    • setPrintContext

      protected final void setPrintContext(com.guidewire.pl.web.print.context.PrintContext printContext)
      Applies a print context to this print operation.
      Parameters:
      printContext - print context to use for printing

    • getPrintContext

      protected final com.guidewire.pl.web.print.context.PrintContext getPrintContext()
      Returns the print context being applied to this print operation.
      Returns:
      context print context to use for printing
